imgDesc.text: In the wilds of Fontaine, you may occasionally encounter these overly-lively — perhaps due to outside influences — contaminated bacterial mats. The contamination clots and contamination cores within can be <color=#ffe14b>cleansed</color> by the abilities of the Xenochromatic Ball Octopus and other <color=#ffe14b>Xenochromatic Fontemer Aberrants</color> .

Due to evolution, sometimes contamination clots will <color=#ffe14b>link</color> together with each other. If these connected contamination clots are not all cleansed, previously removed clots will <color=#ffe14b>regenerate</color> .
Some contamination cores will be protected by an <color=#ffe14b>impenetrable shell</color> , and the surrounding clots must all be cleansed before the shell is removed and the core can be attacked.
Some contamination cores have even evolved the ability to attack, and will defend themselves. Others may actively hunt, seeking more nutrients...
